1: כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הָאָד֜וֹן <sup>113 </sup> <n>For behold the Lord</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֗וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> מֵסִ֤יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>doth take away</n> מִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>from Jerusalem</n> וּמִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and from Judah</n> מַשְׁעֵ֖ן <sup>4937 </sup> <n>the stay</n> וּמַשְׁעֵנָ֑ה <sup>4938 </sup> <n>and the staff</n> כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and the whole</n> מִשְׁעַן־ <sup>4937 </sup> <n>the whole stay</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of bread</n> וְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and the whole</n> מִשְׁעַן־ <sup>4937 </sup> <n>stay</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n>
2: גִּבּ֖וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>The mighty man</n> וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and the man</n> מִלְחָמָ֑ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>the judge</n> וְנָבִ֖יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and the prophet</n> וְקֹסֵ֥ם <sup>7080 </sup> <n>and the prudent</n> וְזָקֵֽן׃ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>and the ancient</n>
3: שַׂר־ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>The captain</n> חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <sup>2572 </sup> <n>of fifty</n> וּנְשׂ֣וּא <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and the honourable</n> פָנִ֑ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>man</n> וְיוֹעֵ֛ץ <sup>3289 </sup> <n>and the counsellor</n> וַחֲכַ֥ם <sup>2450 </sup> <n>and the cunning</n> חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <sup>2798 </sup> <n>Charashim</n> וּנְב֥וֹן <sup>995 </sup> <n>and the eloquent</n> לָֽחַשׁ׃ <sup>3908 </sup> <n>orator</n>
4: וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And I will give</n> נְעָרִ֖ים <sup>5288 </sup> <n>children</n> שָׂרֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>8269 </sup> <n>[to be] their princes</n> וְתַעֲלוּלִ֖ים <sup>8586 </sup> <n>and babes</n> יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>shall rule</n> בָֽם׃
5: וְנִגַּ֣שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>shall be oppressed</n> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> בְּאִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>by another</n> וְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and every one</n> בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>by his neighbour</n> יִרְהֲב֗וּ <sup>7292 </sup> <n>shall behave himself proudly</n> הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <sup>5288 </sup> <n>the child</n> בַּזָּקֵ֔ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>against the ancient</n> וְהַנִּקְלֶ֖ה <sup>7034 </sup> <n>and the base</n> בַּנִּכְבָּֽד׃ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>against the honourable</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִתְפֹּ֨שׂ <sup>8610 </sup> <n>shall take hold</n> אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>When a man</n> בְּאָחִיו֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brother</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> אָבִ֔יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his father</n> שִׂמְלָ֣ה <sup>8071 </sup> <n>[saying] Thou hast clothing</n> לְכָ֔ה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>you</n> קָצִ֖ין <sup>7101 </sup> <n>be thou our ruler</n> תִּֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָּ֑נוּ וְהַמַּכְשֵׁלָ֥ה <sup>4384 </sup> <n>and [let] this ruin</n> הַזֹּ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>will be under</n> יָדֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[be] under thy hand</n>
7: יִשָּׂא֩ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall he swear</n> בַיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֤וּא ׀ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֵאמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> חֹבֵ֔שׁ <sup>2280 </sup> <n>I will not be an healer</n> וּבְבֵיתִ֕י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>for in my house</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> לֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>[is] neither bread</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is neither</n> שִׂמְלָ֑ה <sup>8071 </sup> <n>nor clothing</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>should not</n> תְשִׂימֻ֖נִי <sup>7760 </sup> <n>make</n> קְצִ֥ין <sup>7101 </sup> <n>me not a ruler</n> עָֽם׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n>
8: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> כָשְׁלָה֙ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>is ruined</n> יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>For Jerusalem</n> וִיהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> נָפָ֑ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>is fallen</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֤ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>because their tongue</n> וּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>4611 </sup> <n>and their doings</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>are against</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[are] against the LORD</n> לַמְר֖וֹת <sup>4784 </sup> <n>to provoke</n> עֵנֵ֥י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>the eyes</n> כְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>of his glory</n>
9: הַכָּרַ֤ת <sup>1971 </sup> <n>The shew</n> פְּנֵיהֶם֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>of their countenance</n> עָ֣נְתָה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>doth witness against them</n> בָּ֔ם וְחַטָּאתָ֛ם <sup>2403 </sup> <n>their sin</n> כִּסְדֹ֥ם <sup>5467 </sup> <n>as Sodom</n> הִגִּ֖ידוּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and they declare</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>do</n> כִחֵ֑דוּ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>they hide</n> א֣וֹי <sup>188 </sup> <n>[it] not Woe</n> לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>unto their soul</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גָמְל֥וּ <sup>1580 </sup> <n>for they have rewarded</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> רָעָֽה׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n>
10: אִמְר֥וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Say</n> צַדִּ֖יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>ye to the righteous</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> ט֑וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>that [it shall be] well</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פְרִ֥י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n> מַעַלְלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4611 </sup> <n>of their doings</n> יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>[with him] for they shall eat</n>
11: א֖וֹי <sup>188 </sup> <n>Woe</n> לְרָשָׁ֣ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>unto the wicked</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[it shall be] ill</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גְמ֥וּל <sup>1576 </sup> <n>[with him] for the reward</n> יָדָ֖יו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>shall be given</n> לּֽוֹ׃
12: עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[As for] my people</n> נֹגְשָׂ֣יו <sup>5065 </sup> <n>[are] their oppressors</n> מְעוֹלֵ֔ל <sup>5768 </sup> <n>babe</n> וְנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>and women</n> מָ֣שְׁלוּ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>rule</n> ב֑וֹ עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>over them O my people</n> מְאַשְּׁרֶ֣יךָ <sup>833 </sup> <n>they which lead</n> מַתְעִ֔ים <sup>8582 </sup> <n>thee cause [thee] to err</n> וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> אֹֽרְחֹתֶ֖יךָ <sup>734 </sup> <n>of thy paths</n> בִּלֵּֽעוּ׃ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>and destroy</n> ס
13: נִצָּ֥ב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>standeth up</n> לָרִ֖יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>to plead</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> וְעֹמֵ֖ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and standeth</n> לָדִ֥ין <sup>1777 </sup> <n>to judge</n> עַמִּֽים׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n>
14: יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>into judgment</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>will enter</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> זִקְנֵ֥י <sup>2205 </sup> <n>with the ancients</n> עַמּ֖וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> וְשָׂרָ֑יו <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and the princes</n> וְאַתֶּם֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> בִּֽעַרְתֶּ֣ם <sup>1197 </sup> <n>thereof for ye have eaten up</n> הַכֶּ֔רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>the vineyard</n> גְּזֵלַ֥ת <sup>1500 </sup> <n>the spoil</n> הֶֽעָנִ֖י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>of the poor</n> בְּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[is] in your houses</n>
15: [מַלָּכֶם כ] (מַה־ לָּכֶם֙ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> ק) תְּדַכְּא֣וּ <sup>1792 </sup> <n>to pieces</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>my people</n> וּפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>the faces</n> עֲנִיִּ֖ים <sup>6041 </sup> <n>afflicted</n> תִּטְחָ֑נוּ <sup>2912 </sup> <n>and grind</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> ס
16: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> יַ֚עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>Because</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גָֽבְהוּ֙ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>are haughty</n> בְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> צִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> וַתֵּלַ֙כְנָה֙ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>walking</n> [נְטוֹּות כ] (נְטוּיֹ֣ות <sup>5186 </sup> <n>afternoon</n> ק) גָּר֔וֹן <sup>1627 </sup> <n>necks</n> וּֽמְשַׂקְּר֖וֹת <sup>8265 </sup> <n>and wanton</n> עֵינָ֑יִם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eyes</n> הָל֤וֹךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> וְטָפֹף֙ <sup>2952 </sup> <n>and mincing</n> תֵּלַ֔כְנָה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and walk</n> וּבְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>with their feet</n> תְּעַכַּֽסְנָה׃ <sup>5913 </sup> <n>and making a tinkling</n>
17: וְשִׂפַּ֣ח <sup>5596 </sup> <n>will smite with a scab</n> אֲדֹנָ֔י <sup>136 </sup> <n>Therefore the Lord</n> קָדְקֹ֖ד <sup>6936 </sup> <n>the crown of the head</n> בְּנ֣וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>of the daughters</n> צִיּ֑וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> וַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> פָּתְהֵ֥ן <sup>6596 </sup> <n>their secret parts</n> יְעָרֶֽה׃ <sup>6168 </sup> <n>will discover</n> ס
18: בַּיּ֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֜וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָסִ֣יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>will take away</n> אֲדֹנָ֗י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> תִּפְאֶ֧רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>the bravery</n> הָעֲכָסִ֛ים <sup>5914 </sup> <n>of [their] tinkling ornaments</n> וְהַשְּׁבִיסִ֖ים <sup>7636 </sup> <n>[about their feet] and [their] cauls</n> וְהַשַּׂהֲרֹנִֽים׃ <sup>7720 </sup> <n>and [their] round tires like the moon</n>
19: הַנְּטִיפ֥וֹת <sup>5188 </sup> <n>The chains</n> וְהַשֵּׁיר֖וֹת <sup>8285 </sup> <n>and the bracelets</n> וְהָֽרְעָלֽוֹת׃ <sup>7479 </sup> <n>and the mufflers</n>
20: הַפְּאֵרִ֤ים <sup>6287 </sup> <n>The bonnets</n> וְהַצְּעָדוֹת֙ <sup>6807 </sup> <n>and the ornaments of the legs</n> וְהַקִּשֻּׁרִ֔ים <sup>7196 </sup> <n>and the headbands</n> וּבָתֵּ֥י <sup>1004 </sup> <n>boxes</n> הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>any</n> וְהַלְּחָשִֽׁים׃ <sup>3908 </sup> <n>and the earrings</n>
22: הַמַּֽחֲלָצוֹת֙ <sup>4254 </sup> <n>The changeable suits of apparel</n> וְהַמַּ֣עֲטָפ֔וֹת <sup>4595 </sup> <n>and the mantles</n> וְהַמִּטְפָּח֖וֹת <sup>4304 </sup> <n>and the wimples</n> וְהָחֲרִיטִֽים׃ <sup>2754 </sup> <n>and the crisping pins</n>
23: וְהַגִּלְיֹנִים֙ <sup>1549 </sup> <n>The glasses</n> וְהַסְּדִינִ֔ים <sup>5466 </sup> <n>and the fine linen</n> וְהַצְּנִיפ֖וֹת <sup>6797 </sup> <n>and the hoods</n> וְהָרְדִידִֽים׃ <sup>7289 </sup> <n>and the vails</n>
24: וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> תַ֨חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> בֹּ֜שֶׂם <sup>1314 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass [that] instead of sweet smell</n> מַ֣ק <sup>4716 </sup> <n>there shall be stink</n> יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> וְתַ֨חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Instead</n> חֲגוֹרָ֤ה <sup>2290 </sup> <n>and instead of a girdle</n> נִקְפָּה֙ <sup>5364 </sup> <n>a rent</n> וְתַ֨חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Instead</n> מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>and instead of well set</n> מִקְשֶׁה֙ <sup>4748 </sup> <n>hair</n> קָרְחָ֔ה <sup>7144 </sup> <n>baldness</n> וְתַ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Instead</n> פְּתִיגִ֖יל <sup>6614 </sup> <n>and instead of a stomacher</n> מַחֲגֹ֣רֶת <sup>4228 </sup> <n>a girding</n> שָׂ֑ק <sup>8242 </sup> <n>of sackcloth</n> כִּי־ <sup>3587 </sup> <n>[and] burning</n> תַ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>instead</n> יֹֽפִי׃ <sup>3308 </sup> <n>instead of beauty</n>
25: מְתַ֖יִךְ <sup>4962 </sup> <n>Thy men</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יִפֹּ֑לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> וּגְבוּרָתֵ֖ךְ <sup>1369 </sup> <n>and thy mighty</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>in the war</n>
26: וְאָנ֥וּ <sup>578 </sup> <n>shall lament</n> וְאָבְל֖וּ <sup>56 </sup> <n>and mourn</n> פְּתָחֶ֑יהָ <sup>6607 </sup> <n>And her gates</n> וְנִקָּ֖תָה <sup>5352 </sup> <n>and she [being] desolate</n> לָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the ground</n> תֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>shall sit</n>
